entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@JoeNBC @Scorpio_twelve New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D) said Monday that early responses to the antimalarial drug hydroxychloroquine "anecdotally" suggest its use in the coronavirus fight has been "effective," but that official data was still forthcoming.

https://t.co/eEKX0B5Kg8
